title: He Won’t Stay Out Of My Stuff
itunes:title: He Won’t Stay Out Of My Stuff
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I’m a 46 year old married woman and this is my second marriage. When I was dating my new husband, he’d love wearing my house shoes around the house, even though his feet hang off the back. Then he started wearing my bathrobe until I got him a big comfy one like I have. I’m not even a big woman so it had to be uncomfortable. The moment we moved in together, he was in everything of mine...............................................

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I’m a 46 year old married woman and this is my second marriage. When I was dating my new husband, he’d love wearing my house shoes around the house, even though his feet hang off the back. Then he started wearing my bathrobe until I got him a big comfy one like I have. I’m not even a big woman so it had to be uncomfortable. The moment we moved in together, he was in everything of mine...............................................
